<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Return Fire](/Feats.aspx?ID=6004) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 122 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Deflect Projectile](/Feats.aspx?ID=5991); [Monastic Archer Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5978)

**Requirements**
You are in Monastic Archer Stance, are wielding a bow, and have a free hand.

</column>

---

Snatching an arrow out of the air, you instantly put it to your bow and return fire. When you successfully Deflect a Projectile that's an arrow, as part of that reaction you can immediately make a ranged bow Strike from your own bow by firing the arrow you deflected.
name: Return Fire
requirement: You are in Monastic Archer Stance, are wielding a bow, and have a free hand.
